titles.title: Expressing support for designation of the week beginning March 5, 2017, as "School Social Work Week".
Expressing support for designation of the week beginning March 5, 2017, as "School Social Work Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
Expresses support for the designation of School Social Work Week.
Honors the contributions of school social workers to the success of students in schools.
